sentences.english: Water went down his throat and he started to choke.
sentences.chinese: 水进入他的喉咙，他开始呛住了。

sentences.english: The nearest leaps at his throat.
sentences.chinese: 最近的一只扑向他的喉咙。

sentences.english: Then, I need to check your ears and throat.
sentences.chinese: 然后我再检查一下你的耳朵和喉咙。

sentences.english: The wheat Chai hilt, like a sword ordinary, straight wear kitano musashi throat.
sentences.chinese: 麦子的钗柄如利剑普通，直穿北野武藏的喉咙。

sentences.english: Tina woke up with a sore throat and stuffy nose.
sentences.chinese: 汀娜醒来觉得喉咙痛和鼻塞。

sentences.english: The dwarf's throat felt dry and raspy.
sentences.chinese: 侏儒感到喉咙又干又涩。

sentences.english: In the nose, cilia help to drain mucus from the nasal cavity down to the throat.
sentences.chinese: 比方说鼻子，纤毛可以帮助粘液从鼻腔流到喉咙。

sentences.english: His mouth was wide open--I could see far down into caverns of pale pink throat.
sentences.chinese: 它的嘴巴大张着，能一眼看见它淡粉色喉咙的深处。

sentences.english: This syrup is especially good for dry or tickly coughs.
sentences.chinese: 这种糖浆特别适合干咳或喉咙发痒引起的咳嗽。

sentences.english: All right, this is what I think.
sentences.chinese: 我的喉咙好干，好像有什么东西哽在那里。

sentences.english: His fingers were about her throat and no sound emerged.
sentences.chinese: 他的手指就卡住了她的喉咙，她发不出声音。

sentences.english: Lidocaine is also prescribed for people with very sore throats and those with canker sores in the mouth.
sentences.chinese: 利多卡因也用于喉咙痛和口腔溃疡患者。

sentences.english: Now I felt my palms becoming 13)moist, and my throat drawing together.
sentences.chinese: 现在我觉得掌心湿湿的，喉咙缩成了一团。

sentences.english: The pointed end of the stick pierced through its throat into its mouth.
sentences.chinese: 棍子的尖头从它的喉咙刺进它的嘴里。

sentences.english: He gargles his throat again and then takes a long look at the cavities.
sentences.chinese: 他又嗽嗽喉咙，盯着空牙洞看了许久。

sentences.english: He cleared his throat and then spoke.
sentences.chinese: 他清了清喉咙之后才说话。

definition: tongue/CL:個|个[ge4]/enemy soldier captured for the purpose of extracting information
pit of the stomach/solar plexus/words and thoughts
esophagus/the proper way to eat/food transportation route
mouth/CL:張|张[zhang1]/slap in the face/CL:個|个[ge4]
